name: maksant-agency
description: Complete lead generation pipeline - unified interface

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "PROSPECT,ANALYSIS,OUTREACH,PIPELINE,UI" --prefix-colors "green,blue,yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:prospecting" "npm run dev:analysis" "npm run dev:outreach" "npm run dev:pipeline" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.install:all: cd prospecting-engine && npm install && cd ../analysis-engine && npm install && cd ../outreach-engine && npm install && cd ../pipeline-orchestrator && npm install && cd ../command-center-ui && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: cd command-center-ui && npm run build && cd ..

author: Maksant
